subject: Re: [junit] Essay: The Trouble With JUnit
msgSnippet: ... I m always open to contributions. Stay tuned. I imagine I ll be writing the book out in the open . -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca
messageBody:
Simon Chappell wrote:

> On 11/25/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains762@...
> <mailto:jbrains762%40gmail.com>> wrote:
>
> > Brenda Fry wrote:
> >
> > > Yes, that would help a great deal.
> >
> > OK. I guess I really have to write it now. Look for it somewhere between
> > spring and autumn 2008.
>
> Need a co-author? :-)

I'm always open to contributions. Stay tuned. I imagine I'll be writing
the book "out in the open".
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
